An extract by Mr. Bushell of his late abridgment of the Lord chancellor Bacons philosophical theory in mineral prosecutions published for the satisfaction of his noble friends that importunately desired it. Bushell, Thomas, 1594-1674. Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626. Atlantis.
[2], 54, [14], 9-40 p.: ill., port.
Printed by Tho. Leach, London : 1660.
Dedication signed: Thomas Bushell. A collection of documents relating to Thomas Bushell's mining enterprises. "An abridgement of My Lord Bacon's Atlantis": p. 9-16. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
